swp_compiler_ss13.common.util

Class ModuleProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.common.util.ModuleProvider

  • public class ModuleProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    The module provider gives access to the module implementation which is configured by the ServiceLoader-API. If the configuration of the ServiceLoader-API is not correct, a ServiceConfigurationError may be thrown.
